channel.title: EASYRSC How to add X wait time before creating a new account
channel.description: how do i add 1 account per IP or a 24 hour wait time before creating new account.

item.title: EASYRSC How to add X wait time before creating a new account
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

Im sure it already stores the ip, you only have to implant a timer to wherever the playercreation is handled.

but “erased when you restart” is not a bad thing, otherwise don’t close the server

Read full topic
item.source: EASYRSC How to add X wait time before creating a new account

item.title: EASYRSC How to add X wait time before creating a new account
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

You don’t have to add date and shit… Set a timer for creating a account with the same ip. Don’t make it more complicated then it is.

item.title: EASYRSC How to add X wait time before creating a new account
item.dc:creator: @Shob Shob
item.description:
@Shob wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:2, topic:329776”]you could make a file that stores the ip and the time of the account creation, so the server wouldn’t need to run through all the files. like…

**IP ADDRESS** **TIME CREATED MM-DD-YYYY** 192.0.0.1 15:36 1-1-10 00:00 192.0.0.1 16:51 1-2-10 00:00[/quote]

This pretty much is your best bet.

Read full topic
item.source: EASYRSC How to add X wait time before creating a new account
